page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: My name is Emma Lewis and I am 11 years old. At 7.30 my dad wakes me up. I go to the bathroom and wash. I get dressed and go downstairs to help lay the table. One of my morning jobs is sweeping the garage. After this I eat my breakfast, then clean my teeth. Until 8.30 I read the paper. Then I call for my friends and we go to school. We have assembly after the register is called. Then we work until playtime. Then more work till dinner. In the afternoon we do some project work until we go home. I walk home and have my tea. After my tea I go outside and play. I come in and watch some T.V. Today I watched a programme called "Allo,Allo" on the video. My dad had recorded it on Monday. After that I go upstairs to practise on my organ. I read for a while then I go to bed.
